Perseus Mining (ASX:PRU) has been on a strong run lately, with the share price up about 4% in the past day, 11% over the month, and more than 20% in the past 3 months. articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Perseus Mining Refinances and Upsizes Debt Facility to US$400M. This stock often attracts value minded investors trying to decide if now is the moment to step in or top up. Despite a modest 2.0% gain over the last year, the stock has climbed 7.7% in the past month even after a 2.2% dip this week, and it remains up 34.1% over three years and 90.3% over five years.
